page_content:
MagellanHealth.com
©2018 Magellan Health, Inc.Our	Avon,	CT	office	shared	their	incredible 	
generosity,	time	and	holiday	spirit	in 	
December	by	“adopting”	a	single	mom	and 	
daughter and furnishing their home.  
They	went	above	and	beyond	to	collect	food,	cleaning	supplies, 	
toiletries,	furniture,	kitchen	items,	small	appliances,	clothes	and 	
winter	coats.	Additionally,	they	were	able	to	provide	a	$500	gift	card 	
and a few surprise presents for both mother and daughter. The duo 
were beyond thankful to the Magellan team!
